meanings.definition: The four-hundredth anniversary of a significant event.
meanings.sent1: The town celebrated the quatercentenaries of its founding with a big parade.
meanings.sent2: Next year, we will commemorate the quatercentenaries of the historical battle.
meanings.sent3: At the quatercentenaries party, everyone dressed up in old-fashioned costumes.
meanings.sent4: The quatercentenaries of the treaty signing marked a new era of peace.
meanings.sent5: The quatercentenaries of the discovery were a time of reflection and pride.

meanings.definition: A celebration or observance of a four-hundredth anniversary.
meanings.sent1: The quatercentenaries included fireworks, music, and a grand feast.
meanings.sent2: People from all over the country gathered for the quatercentenaries of the city's establishment.
meanings.sent3: The quatercentenaries event was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: The quatercentenaries festivities brought the community together in unity.
meanings.sent5: The quatercentenaries ceremony honored the past and looked towards the future.
